MemoryInfobox.description: 'After Kassandra's efforts in Megaris, an artist was asked to create a statue of the 'misthios'. Bitter, the artist wished for Kassandra to prove her worth by helping with a wolf problem.'

General_Description: '''Another Wolf Another Day''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: After meeting [[Nikolaos]] following the [[Battle of Megara]], Kassandra ran into a sculptor.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire.'' Can I help you with anything?''
*'''Woman:''' ''You think you're so incredible, don't you?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What?''
*'''Woman:''' ''You play hero for the [[Sparta]]n army in Megaris, and now you think you can do anything. Can't believe the town is asking me to build a statue of you.''

<tabber>
|-|I deserve a statue.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What I did couldn't have been achieved by some Malákas like you. Glad to hear I'm finally getting some recognition.
|-|A statue is a bit much.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I did what had to be done. A statue may be... overdoing it.''
</tabber>
*'''Woman:''' ''Before I agree to making some statue in your honor, I want you to do something for the people. There's a pack of [[Wolf|wolves]] that's been harassing my village. You want to be a real hero? Now's your chance.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Wolves, huh?''
*'''Woman:''' ''Yes, real wolves. Not just some self-important Spartan in a [[The Wolf's Helm|silly helmet]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let me guess, you want me to hunt the wolves?''
*'''Woman:''' ''Yes, all of them must be gutted. Do you accept?''
(Accept – I'll kill the beasts.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm in.''
*'''Woman:''' ''You're truly brave, [[mercenary]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.''
Kassandra hunted down the three wolves before returning to the woman.
*'''Woman:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.''
*'''Woman:''' ''So you are as brave as you look. Please, take this as thanks.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra dealt with the artist's wolf-problem, and was rewarded for this.
Section_Trivia: *This impact quest is triggered by completing the [[The Wolf of Sparta]]. Specifics are unknown.
